DESCRIPTION: Meanie Points add additional damage to attacks. Goes away at end of turn.
Treasures are special Colorless cards with Ethereal and Exhaust.
It's your Favorite Attack! If you haven't picked a favorite yet, choose 1 of 2 Attacks - plus a mystery option - and add it into your hand!

If you have... NL 1 Horror: Nothing happens. NL 2 Horror: At the start of combat, lose 2 HP. NL 3 Horror: Enemies start with 1 Intangible and 1 Strength. NL 4 Horror: At the start of your turn, discard 1 random card. NL 5 Horror: Whenever you play a card, #rdiscard #ryour #rhand.
